languages.text: {n}Старшина меряет вас долгим, подозрительным взглядом. Дуло огнемета как бы невзначай поворачивается в вашу сторону.{/n} "Брешете, судар{mf|ь|ыня}. Мы все проходы перекрыли добротно, ведь карантин — это не только, чтобы никто не вошел, но и чтобы никто не вышел. Вы так не шуткуйте больше, а то я и поверить могу". {n}Огнемет шумно пыхает в воздух.{/n}

{n}The foreman looks you up and down with a long gaze full of suspicion. The barrel of his flamer turns in your direction with seeming nonchalance.{/n} "That's a load of groxwash, {mf|sir|ma'am}. We did a thorough job sealing off every passage, what with quarantine being about no one getting in — or out. Don't joke like that anymore, or I might take you at your word." {n}The flamer releases a noisy burst of fire into the air.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Старшина меряет вас долгим, подозрительным взглядом. Дуло огнемета как бы невзначай поворачивается в вашу сторону.{/n} "Брешете, судар{mf|ь|ыня}. Мы все проходы перекрыли добротно, ведь карантин — это не только, чтобы никто не вошел, но и чтобы никто не вышел. Вы так не шуткуйте больше, а то я и поверить могу". {n}Огнемет шумно пыхает в воздух.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The foreman looks you up and down with a long gaze full of suspicion. The barrel of his flamer seemingly casually turns in your direction.{/n} "That's a load of baloney, {mf|sir|ma'am}. We did a thorough job sealing off every passage, what with quarantine being about no one getting in — or out. Don't joke like that anymore, or I might take you at your word." {n}The flamer releases a noisy burst of fire into the air.{/n}

Don't joke like that anymore, or I might take you at your word." {n}The flamer releases a noisy burst of fire into the air.{/n}

Don't joke like that anymore, or I might take you at your word." {n}The flamer releases a noisy burst of fire into the air.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Vorarbeiter mustert dich ausgiebig mit einem misstrauischen Blick. Der Lauf seines Flammenwerfers deutet fast beiläufig in deine Richtung.{/n} "Das ist Großscheiße, {mf|Sir|Madam}. Wir haben jede Passage gründlich abgeriegelt, denn bei einer Quarantäne soll nun einmal niemand reinkommen – oder raus. Spart Euch künftig solche Witze, sonst nehme ich Euch beim Wort." {n}Der Flammenwerfer spuckt lautstark einen Feuerstoß in die Luft.{/n}

Don't joke like that anymore, or I might take you at your word." {n}The flamer releases a noisy burst of fire into the air.{/n}

Der Lauf seines Flammenwerfers deutet fast beiläufig in deine Richtung.{/n} "Das ist Großscheiße, {mf|Sir|Madam}. Spart Euch künftig solche Witze, sonst nehme ich Euch beim Wort." {n}Der Flammenwerfer spuckt lautstark einen Feuerstoß in die Luft.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le contremaître vous examine des pieds à la tête d'un air suspicieux, puis il braque le canon de son lance-flamme sur vous avec une apparente nonchalance.{/n} « Vous me racontez des foutaises, {mf|monsieur|madame}. On a bien veillé à bloquer tous les passages, vu que la quarantaine a pour but d'empêcher qui que ce soit d'entrer ou de sortir. Ne plaisantez pas avec ça, sinon je risque de vous croire sur parole. » {n}Le lance-flamme crache bruyamment un jet de feu dans les airs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The foreman looks you up and down with a long gaze full of suspicion. The barrel of his flamer turns in your direction with seeming nonchalance.{/n} "That's a load of groxwash, {mf|sir|ma'am}. We did a thorough job sealing off every passage, what with quarantine being about no one getting in — or out. Don't joke like that anymore, or I might take you at your word." {n}The flamer releases a noisy burst of fire into the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le contremaître vous examine des pieds à la tête d'un air suspicieux, puis il braque le canon de son lance-flamme sur vous avec une apparente nonchalance.{/n} « Vous me racontez des foutaises, {mf|monsieur|madame}. On a bien veillé à bloquer tous les passages, vu que la quarantaine a pour but d'empêcher qui que ce soit d'entrer ou de sortir. Ne plaisantez pas avec ça, sinon je risque de vous croire sur parole. » {n}Le lance-flamme crache bruyamment un jet de feu dans les airs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}领班把你从头到尾打量了一遍，目光中充满了怀疑。随后，他以看似随意的动作，将手中的火焰喷射器转向了你的方向。{/n}“简直是胡说八道，{mf|先生|女士}。我们已经做好了彻底的隔离工作，封锁了每条通道，不可能有任何人进出。像这样的玩笑可别再开了，否则，我说不定就要当真了。”{n}火焰喷射器朝空中喷射出了一阵火焰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The foreman looks you up and down with a long gaze full of suspicion. The barrel of his flamer turns in your direction with seeming nonchalance.{/n} "That's a load of groxwash, {mf|sir|ma'am}. We did a thorough job sealing off every passage, what with quarantine being about no one getting in — or out. Don't joke like that anymore, or I might take you at your word." {n}The flamer releases a noisy burst of fire into the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}领班把你从头到尾打量了一遍，目光中充满了怀疑。随后，他以看似随意的动作，将手中的火焰喷射器转向了你的方向。{/n}“简直是胡说八道，{mf|先生|女士}。我们已经做好了彻底的隔离工作，封锁了每条通道，不可能有任何人进出。像这样的玩笑可别再开了，否则，我说不定就要当真了。”{n}火焰喷射器朝空中喷射出了一阵火焰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El capataz te dedica una mirada cargada de suspicacia. El cañón de su lanzallamas se gira hacia ti con aparente indiferencia.{/n} «A mí eso me suena a mierda de grox, señor{mf||a}. Nos hemos asegurado de sellar cada pasadiza, ya que la cuarentena se trata de evitar que nadie entre ni salga. No vuelva a hacer otra broma como esa o tendré que tomarle la palabra». {n}El lanzallamas dispara un ruidoso chorro de fuego al aire.{/n}

Don't joke like that anymore, or I might take you at your word." {n}The flamer releases a noisy burst of fire into the air.{/n}

Nos hemos asegurado de sellar cada pasadiza, ya que la cuarentena se trata de evitar que nadie entre ni salga. No vuelva a hacer otra broma como esa o tendré que tomarle la palabra». {n}El lanzallamas dispara un ruidoso chorro de fuego al aire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}作業長は疑いに満ちた視線で長い間あなたをじっと見つめた。彼のフレイマーの銃口が、一見無造作にあなたの方へ向けられる。{/n}「陛下、そんなのはデタラメです。隔離ってのは誰も入れないし、出さないってことだから、通路は徹底的に封鎖したんです。そんな冗談はやめてくださいよ。じゃないと本気にしちゃいますよ」{n}フレイマーが騒々しく火炎の噴射を空中に放った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The foreman looks you up and down with a long gaze full of suspicion. The barrel of his flamer turns in your direction with seeming nonchalance.{/n} "That's a load of groxwash, {mf|sir|ma'am}. We did a thorough job sealing off every passage, what with quarantine being about no one getting in — or out. Don't joke like that anymore, or I might take you at your word." {n}The flamer releases a noisy burst of fire into the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}作業長は疑いに満ちた視線で長い間あなたをじっと見つめた。彼のフレイマーの銃口が、一見無造作にあなたの方へ向けられる。{/n}「陛下、そんなのはデタラメです。隔離ってのは誰も入れないし、出さないってことだから、通路は徹底的に封鎖したんです。そんな冗談はやめてくださいよ。じゃないと本気にしちゃいますよ」{n}フレイマーが騒々しく火炎の噴射を空中に放った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ustabaşı, seni baştan ayağa süzüyor. Alevsaçanının namlusu görünüşte lakayıt bir savruluşla sana dönüyor.{/n} "Zırvalık efendim. Geçitlerin hepsini sıkı sıkı mühürledik, karantina demek kimsenin girip çıkmaması demek. Bu tür lafları bir daha etmeyin yoksa söylediğinizi gerçek sanıp gereğini yaparım." {n}Alevsaçan, havaya doğru bir alev püskürtüyor.{/n}

We did a thorough job sealing off every passage, what with quarantine being about no one getting in — or out. Don't joke like that anymore, or I might take you at your word." {n}The flamer releases a noisy burst of fire into the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ustabaşı, seni baştan ayağa süzer. Alevsaçanının namlusu görünüşte lakayıt bir savruluşla sana döner.{/n} "Zırvalık efendim. Geçitlerin hepsini sıkı sıkı mühürledik, karantina demek kimsenin girip çıkmaması demek. Bu tür lafları bir daha etmeyin yoksa söylediğinizi gerçek sanıp gereğini yaparım." {n}Alevsaçan, havaya doğru bir alev püskürtür.{/n}
